scripts.sam:deploy: sam deploy --template-file .aws-sam/build/packaged-template.yaml --stack-name $(grep MENTORSHIP_STACK_NAME .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --no-fail-on-empty-changeset --s3-prefix $(grep MENTORSHIP_STACK_NAME .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.deploy: npm run sam:build && npm run sam:package && npm run sam:deploy
